testcase.name: Login and create a new user
Login Tests › Positive Tests › Login with valid credentials should succeed
Login Tests › Negative Tests › Login with invalid email should fail
Login Tests › Negative Tests › Login with empty credentials should fail
Login Tests › Negative Tests › Login with wrong password should fail

failure.message: login.spec.ts:130:9 Login with wrong password should fail
